messages.title: THE PROGRESSIVE CHOICE FOR BRISTOL WEST
messages.content: Thangam Debbonaire is presented as a proactive choice, actively standing up against triggering Article 50, advocating for schools, and tackling air pollution.

messages.title: SUPPORTING BRISTOL'S SCHOOLS
messages.content: Thangam Debbonaire has visited schools and is fighting against new funding formulas that she believes put children's education at risk.

messages.title: Standing up for refugee rights
messages.content: Thangam Debbonaire, chair of the All-Party Parliamentary Group on Refugees, is known for advocating the rights of refugees.

messages.title: Labour wins clean air deal
messages.content: Thangam Debbonaire has campaigned for a Clean Air Zone in Bristol, targeting air pollution and improving public health.

messages.title: Refugee Inquiry
messages.content: Thangam Debbonaire is leading a public inquiry into how refugees are treated when they reach the UK.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes new funding formulas for schools; advocates for educational resources in Bristol West.
Campaigned for a Clean Air Zone in Bristol to tackle air pollution.
Chairs the All-Party Parliamentary Group on Refugees and scrutinizes the treatment of refugees.

mentions.partyLeader: Since being elected in 2015, Thangam has maximised her impact by supporting Labour's Jeremy Corbyn, and by voting according to her conscience and the best interests of Bristol West.

issues.education: Thangam has visited schools and discusses the impact of new funding formulas on education.
issues.environment: Advocates for improved air quality through campaigning for a Clean Air Zone.
issues.immigration: Thangam is actively involved in refugee rights and is leading a public inquiry into the treatment of refugees.

leaflet.personalStatement: Thangam states: 'I was elected to use my platform to speak up about the treatment of refugees here and abroad.'

politicalExperience.role: Chair of the All-Party Parliamentary Group on Refugees

quotes.text: Since being elected in 2015, I have aimed to maximise my impact by supporting our Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn, by voting according to my conscience and the best interests of Bristol West.

images.caption: Images include Thangam Debbonaire engaging in various activities such as speaking at events, campaigning, visiting schools, and meetings.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet promotes successes such as influencing clean air legislation, combatting agency fees, advocating for compulsory PSHE education, and pushing for autism-friendly communities.
